description: This Dart source file defines the `BookingsService` class, which provides methods for creating bookings via a REST API. It imports necessary packages for HTTP requests and data modeling, and contains functionality to send POST requests with booking data and handle responses and exceptions.

classes.name: BookingsService
classes.description: A service class responsible for creating bookings through API calls.

methods.name: createBooking
methods.description: Creates a new booking by sending a POST request to the backend API. Returns a `Booking` object if successful.

methods.name: _formatDate
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a string with the format 'yyyy-MM-dd'.
